title: Introduced species may outcompete native species

content.question: Population biologists are concerned about introduced species such as the zebra mussel in North America because

choices.label: their removal from their native habitat has a negative impact
predators of the introduced species often overpopulate because of the influx of the introduced species
the introduced species compete for resources more effectively than native species
introduced species often become endangered when they are placed in a new habitat
their introduction will require more land to be protected

content.answer: the introduced species compete for resources more effectively than native species
